channel.title: Achievements
channel.description: I was on my friends server but I don't want to ask him how he did it if its easy but on his server he had achievements like the ones i uploaded and I was wanting to know if someone had a tutorial on how to add them or a client/server I could rip them from. I prefer the second one cause I want to learn how to add them more then just do a tutorial and not really learn anything other then copy and paste. :P

item.title: Achievements
item.dc:creator: @ReZ-Gaming ReZ-Gaming
item.description:
@ReZ-Gaming wrote:

There’s a pic of it…
Say if you get a certain amount of kills like 50 it lights up green when you have completed it and then under it it’ll be like 100 kills etc.

Read full topic
